title: Anyone else experience this? Muting microphone in phone app mutes for ALL apps.
content:
I just figured out why none of my apps would record audio on my Pixel 5 running Android 11.
Somehow I had muted the mic in the phone app and it had muted the mic for all the other apps?
Took me forever to figure this out - thought I was going to have to return the phone...
I only figure out when I went to phone someone to test the mic in the phone app and they couldn't hear me there either. I noticed the mic was muted, unmuted it, and it worked everywhere else again.
